Traits.Name: Overwhelm
Traits.Description: 1/round, when the butcher hits a foe with an attack, after the attack resolves they mark that foe. This mark cannot be cleared, and stacks, indefinitely. For each stack of this mark, the butcher deals +3 damage to that character with attacks. All stacks of this mark immediately end on one character if the butcher hits and marks a different character with an attack.
